item.title: Contract First Web Service Development in .NET
item.description: Working on information systems integration often comes with the task of implementing a Web Service following a previously defined contract. This can happen with a design-first approach or a partner interoperability project where you must implement the expected receiver for the incoming data. To develop an XML web service, having an existing WSDL, we can use the tooling provided with Microsoft Visual Studio. We will use an ASMX project. If you’re worried about support because this is no longer a part of .
